A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is really bad. Takes no character to nowhere\, The movies is about breaking expectations\, Yes it is new and bold\, but this movie didn't delivers nothing. Entire sequences are created\, raise expectations and end in nothing. I'm not a hardcore fan that is offended by the total disrespect for decades of lore\, but I'm am disapointed because this movie is not a Star Wars movie that is bad\, it is a bad movie plain and simple. Nothing makes sense\, Lots of side quests that end in nothing. Terrible movie.
